VIEWS_SPEC.VIEW_TEXT: (CHN_OBJECT_ID,CHN_MODIFIED_BY,CHN_MODIFIED_ON,CHN_CREATED_ON,CHN_CREATED_BY,CUSTOM_FIELD10,CUSTOM_FIELD9,CUSTOM_FIELD8,CUSTOM_FIELD7,CUSTOM_FIELD6,STATUS,SUBSCRIPTION_ID,SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS,NOTIFY_BY_EMAIL,FILTER_KEYWORDS,CHANNEL_NAME,CHANNEL_ID,CUSTOM_FIELD4,CUSTOM_FIELD5,CUSTOM_FIELD3,CUSTOM_FIELD2,CUSTOM_FIELD1,ATTACHMENT,RTF_ATTACH,OBJECT_NAME,OBJECT_ID,DD_PROCESS_CODE,DD_CURRENT_STAGE,DD_ENTERPRISE_INFO,DD_EVENT_USER_NAME,DD_CURRENT_USER_NAME,DD_OBJECT_TYPE,INSTANCE_REC_NUM,INSTANCE_ID,METRIC_ID,METRIC_RUN_DATE,METRIC_COMPLETED_DATE,LATEST_FLAG,CREATED_BY,CREATION_DATE,PROCESS_FLOW_STATUS,PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID,MULTIROW_GROUP_NAME,ELECTRONICALLY_SIGNED,MULTIROW_REGION_ID,USER_ID) AS select "CHN_OBJECT_ID", "CHN_MODIFIED_BY", "CHN_MODIFIED_ON", "CHN_CREATED_ON", "CHN_CREATED_BY", "CUSTOM_FIELD10", "CUSTOM_FIELD9", "CUSTOM_FIELD8", "CUSTOM_FIELD7", "CUSTOM_FIELD6", "STATUS", "SUBSCRIPTION_ID", "SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS", "NOTIFY_BY_EMAIL", "FILTER_KEYWORDS", "CHANNEL_NAME", "CHANNEL_NAME" "CHANNEL_ID", "CUSTOM_FIELD4", "CUSTOM_FIELD5", "CUSTOM_FIELD3", "CUSTOM_FIELD2", "CUSTOM_FIELD1", "ATTACHMENT", "RTF_ATTACH", "OBJECT_NAME", "OBJECT_ID", "DD_PROCESS_CODE", "DD_CURRENT_STAGE", "DD_ENTERPRISE_INFO", "DD_EVENT_USER_NAME", "DD_CURRENT_USER_NAME", "DD_OBJECT_TYPE", "INSTANCE_REC_NUM", "INSTANCE_ID", "METRIC_ID", "METRIC_RUN_DATE", "METRIC_COMPLETED_DATE", "LATEST_FLAG", "CREATED_BY", "CREATION_DATE", "PROCESS_FLOW_STATUS", "PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID", "MULTIROW_GROUP_NAME", "ELECTRONICALLY_SIGNED", "MULTIROW_REGION_ID", "CHN_CREATED_BY" "USER_ID" from ms_rga_my_subscription_v where subscription_id is not null
